name: Radiant Greninja
author: Souichirou Gunjima
flavor_text: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

abilities.name: Concealed Cards
abilities.effect: You must discard an Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Moonlight Shuriken
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
